trans-unit.source: Specifies a type that contains the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> for a peer node as well as an optional collection of multihoming IP addresses.
trans-unit.target: 指定包含型別<xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>對等節點的選擇性集合的多重主目錄 IP 位址。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress"></xref> with the supplied <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> and a collection of multihoming IP addresses also configured for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress"></xref>及所提供<xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>和集合，多重主目錄 IP 位址，同時設定給本機電腦。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> that represents the address of the peer node within the mesh.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>表示對等網狀結構內節點的位址。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> that contains IP addresses configured for the local computer, and which can be used to connect to the peer node.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> ，其中包含本機電腦，設定 IP 位址和它可以用來連接到對等節點。

trans-unit.source: One of the arguments supplied to the constructor is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個提供給建構函式的引數設為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of multihoming IP addresses for this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得的多重主目錄 IP 位址集合這個<xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A collection of multihoming IP addresses associated with this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 集合的多重主目錄 IP 位址與此相關聯<xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress"> </xref>。
